      boolean matches(java.lang.String msg, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data, java.lang.String c_error)

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        boolean matches(java.lang.String msg,
              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data,
              java.lang.String c_error)
        Checks what could be the cause of the error.
        Parameters:
        msg - Exception message.
        data - (Optional) Added data to the exception.
        c_error - (Optional) Another exception message.
        Returns:
        True if it matches; False if not
